question: Which two are characteristics of the Front Controller pattern? (Choose two.)

options.A: It simplifies remote interfaces to distributed objects.
options.B: It promotes cleaner application partitioning and encourages reuse.
options.C: It provides an initial point of contact for handling all related requests.
options.D: It reduces maintainability due to the increased complexity of the design.
options.E: It provides loosely coupled handlers that can be combined in various permutations.
